ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView

Class DrawingView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView.DrawingView

  • public class DrawingView
extends View
    The view to draw the user's drawing on. Driven by a DrawingModel
